articles.author: Katya Witney
articles.title: Adam Zampa equals unwanted world record as Klaasen and Miller obliterate Australia - Wisden
articles.description: Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller put on a blistering assault against Australia, thumping Adam Zampa for a harrowing World Record. Read here.
articles.content: Adam Zampa equalled the world record for the most expensive men’s ODI bowling figures in history after Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller unleashed a brutal assault in the fourth ODI of the series bet… [+2636 chars]

articles.title: India procures monoclonal antibodies from Australia to battle deadly Nipah virus - WION
articles.description: India procures monoclonal antibodies from Australia to battle deadly Nipah virus
articles.content:
India has taken a significant step in its preparedness to combat the dangerous Nipah virus by procuring an additional 20 doses of monoclonal antibodies from Australia. 
On Friday, Indian Council of … [+2072 chars]

articles.author: Sneha Mordani
articles.title: Mortality rate way higher for Nipah virus than coronavirus, warns government panel - India Today
articles.description: The government will procure 20 more doses of a medicine from Australia for the treatment of the Nipah virus. Currently, the southern state of Kerala is witnessing a rise in the cases of Nipah virus.
articles.content: The Director General of the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) Rajeev Bahl on Friday warned that the mortality rate in Nipah virus infection cases is very high compared to the Covid-19 infecti… [+1589 chars]
